Convert xls to xlsx

Source: R/convert_xls_as_xlsx.R
convert_xls_as_xlsx.Rd

Convert xls to xlsx

Usage

convert_xls_as_xlsx(
  input_dir,
  export_dir = tempdir(),
  office_folder = safe_office_folder(),
  dbg = TRUE
)

Arguments

input_dir

input directory containing .xls files

export_dir

export directory (default: tempdir())

office_folder

office folder path (default: safe_office_folder)

dbg

debug (default: TRUE)
